titles.title: A joint resolution designating the week of February 7, 1988, through February 13, 1988, as "National Crime Prevention Week" in honor of those individuals in the United States involved in the fight against crime.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 2/10/1987--Introduced. Designates the week of February 7 through February 13, 1988, as National Crime Prevention Week.
